title: Distributed KV Store
description: A high-performance distributed key-value store built in C++ using the Raft consensus algorithm for fault tolerance and strong consistency.

title: LSM Tree Storage Engine
description: A persistent Key-Value store following the Log-Structured Merge Tree architecture. Implemented from scratch in C++ for learning purposes.

title: Distributed Task Queue
description: A high-performance task queue built in Go, using Redis as the backend. Features include retry logic, task prioritization, and massive concurrency.
